Class Store

coreClasses.Store

  • Constructor Details

    • Store

      public Store​(java.lang.String name, java.lang.String specialty, java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,​java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,​java.lang.Integer>> sellCatalogue, java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,​java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,​java.lang.Integer>> buyCatalogue)
      Constructor for Store Class
      Parameters:
      name - String name of Store object to be created
      specialty - String for the specialty of a Store
      sellCatalogue - HashMap of Items that the store sells
      buyCatalogue - HashMap of Items that a store buys

  • Method Details

    • chosenItemName

      public static java.lang.String chosenItemName​(java.lang.String[] displayArray, int chosenItemNum)
      Gets the name of a chosen item to be sold or bought. Used by Cmd Line Ui to find the name of an Item that was displayed.
      Parameters:
      displayArray - Array that details items that can be sold or bought
      chosenItemNum - ItemNum action int chosen by cmd line ui of chosen item. This is one less than the actual index in displayArray
      Returns:
      String for the name of a chosen Item name

    • checkPlayerWantsToBuy

      public java.lang.String checkPlayerWantsToBuy​(GameEnvironment gameEnvironment, java.lang.String itemName, int quantity)
      Method to check if a player wants to buy an item. If buying an item puts them in a position where they need to sell items in order to travel to another island, then it returns a string. otherwise returns null if they dont need to be asked. Used by Ui before buying an item
      Parameters:
      gameEnvironment - GameEnivornment object belonging to the current object bought
      itemName - String for the name of the Item that a user wants to buy from a store
      quantity - Integer for the number of items that a user wants to buy
      Returns:
      String Asking user to confirm that they want to sell an item if applicable, otherwise null

    • sellItemsToPlayer

      public java.lang.String sellItemsToPlayer​(GameEnvironment gameEnvironment, java.lang.String itemStoreToSellName, int numItems)
      Entry point for selling an item to a player. Calls Item sellItemToPlayer(GameEnvironment gameEnvironment, String itemName) for individual selling of items
      Parameters:
      gameEnvironment - GameEnvironment object for the current game
      itemStoreToSellName - String of the name of the requested item to sell to a player
      numItems - Integer for the number of items requested to sell to a player
      Returns:
      String for the receipt of this transaction

    • canSellItemToPlayer

      public java.lang.String canSellItemToPlayer​(GameEnvironment gameEnvironment, Item itemToSell)
      Checks if selling an item from a store is permissible. Returns "Can sell" if permissable otherwise returns a String returning the reason why not.
      Parameters:
      itemToSell - Item being checked if it can be sold
      gameEnvironment - GameEnvironment object for this current game
      Returns:
      String representation if item can be sold or not, along with a reason if not.

    • canSellUpgradeToPlayer

      public static java.lang.String canSellUpgradeToPlayer​(GameEnvironment gameEnvironment, Item itemToSell)
      Checks if a store can sell an upgrade to a player. Returns "Can sell" if it can, otherwise returns a String for the reason explaining why not.
      Parameters:
      gameEnvironment - GameEnvironment object for this current game
      itemToSell - Item object that is trying to be sold to a Player
      Returns:
      Boolean if ShipUpgrade object can be sold.

    • buyItemsFromPlayer

      public java.lang.String buyItemsFromPlayer​(java.lang.String itemStoreToBuyName, Player player, int numItems)
      Method for buying items from a player Calls buyItemFromPlayer(String itemName, Player player) for individual items Buys multiple instances of the Item given by itemStoreToBuyName
      Parameters:
      itemStoreToBuyName - String for the requested item to be bought from a player
      player - Player object who is selling items to a store
      numItems - Integer for the number of items requested to sell
      Returns:
      String for the receipt of the transaction

    • canBuyItemFromPlayer

      public static java.lang.String canBuyItemFromPlayer​(Player player, Item itemToBuy)
      Checks if buying an item from a PLAYER TO A STORE is permissible if it is returns the string "Can buy" otherwise returns a string explaining why it cannot be done.
      Parameters:
      player - Player object trying to buy an item
      itemToBuy - Item object trying to be bought by a player
      Returns:
      String for explaining if buying is permissible or not

    • catalogueToArray

      public java.lang.String[] catalogueToArray​(java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,​java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,​java.lang.Integer>> catalogue)
      Converts a sell or buy catalogue into an an Array that can be easily displayed by cmd line UI
      Parameters:
      catalogue - HashMap catalogue to be parsed into an Array
      Returns:
      Array for what you can buy or sell from a store

    • catalogueToNestedArray

      public java.lang.String[][] catalogueToNestedArray​(java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,​java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,​java.lang.Integer>> catalogue, java.lang.String buyOrSell)
      Method to turn a catalogue into a nested array representation Used by GUI for displaying contents in tabular form
      Parameters:
      catalogue - HashMap for a catalogue to be converted into a nested array
      buyOrSell - String for the operation that a user wants to do, either "buy" or "sell"
      Returns:
      String[][] nested array description of an inputed catalogue

    • catalogueToString

      public java.lang.String catalogueToString​(java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,​java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,​java.lang.Integer>> catalogue, java.lang.String buyOrSell)
      Creates and returns a string representation of the given catalogue, useful for giving a quick overview of what a store buys or sells. Is called by island.fullInfo.
      Parameters:
      catalogue - The catalogue (either buy or sell) to be made into a string.
      buyOrSell - Whether the catalogue is for items to be bought or sold. Should be "buy" or "sell".
      Returns:
      A string representation of the catalogue.

    • getCatalogue

      public java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,​java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,​java.lang.Integer>> getCatalogue​(java.lang.String buyOrSell)
      General getter method for getting either the buyCatalogue or sellCatalogue of a store. Useful for use in UI to increase code usability and maintainability.
      Parameters:
      buyOrSell - String for the operation requested, should be "buy" or "sell" otherwise method returns null.
      Returns:
      HashMap catalogue associated with 'buyOrSell'

      Returns:
      String[] for the options of visiting a store

      Returns:
